item.title: Trump commutes sentence of former Rep. George Santos, who was serving 7 years for fraud and identity theft
item.description: “George Santos was somewhat of a ‘rogue,’ but there are many rogues throughout our Country that aren’t forced to serve seven years in prison."

item.title: U.S. auto delinquencies have jumped 50% from 15 years ago
item.description: “Consumers now are in a more precarious position than they’ve been since the last recession,” said Rikard Bandebo, VantageScore’s chief economist.

item.title: Rattled Wall Street on alert after trillion-dollar risk runup
item.description: Stocks still ended the week with a tidy gain, but six days of volatility across assets shows a deeper anxiety taking hold: credit fragility.

item.title: Wealthy millennial, Gen Z Platinum members drive American Express to record revenue: ‘very comfortable paying for its exceptional value’
item.description: Platinum is morphing into "the premium lifestyle card," CEO Steve Squeri says. The market sent shares up more than 7% on the strength of the status sy...

item.title: OpenAI pauses AI-generated deepfakes of Martin Luther King Jr. on Sora 2 app after ‘disrespectful’ depictions
item.description: “For me, many of the AI depictions never rose to the level of free speech,” Bernice A. King wrote on X. “They were foolishness.”
